# Laundry Services for CFIA Burnaby and Calgary Laboratories

## Tender Information

* **Solicitation Number**: 2024-00193
* **Reference Number**: cb-289-87876770
* **Publication Date**: December 22, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 25, 2024 (4:00 PM ET)
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Amendment Date**: January 25, 2024
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)

## Description of Services

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) is seeking a contractor to provide laundry services for its Burnaby and Calgary laboratories. The services include rental, laundry, and delivery of protective garments, white glass towels, white bath towels, and mats.

* **Contract Period**: February 1, 2024 to March 31, 2029 (with an option to extend for up to three (3) additional one-year periods)
* **Security Level**: None

## Trade Agreements

* **WTO-AGP**: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
* **CCFTA**: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* **CPFTA**: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* **CFTA**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement
* **CPTPP**: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
* **CKFTA**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* **CETA**: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
* **OTHER**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Significant Factors

* **Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB)**: The procurement is open to both Indigenous and non-Indigenous businesses. If two or more Indigenous businesses submit a bid, then the procurement is set aside under PSIB.
* **Conditionally Set Aside**: The procurement is conditionally set aside under the PSIB.

## Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation will be based on a combination of technical merit and price. The proposed contract period is from February 1, 2024 to March 31, 2029.

## Opportunity for Online Processing

Online viewing and downloading of the RFQ documents are available at [link] (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28395/2024-00193-rfp.zip, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28395/2024-00193---
